name: Amazing Moving Average
short_description: In addition to choosing the type of moving average you can also choose the type, deviation helps monitor laterality points.

params.title: Amazing Moving Average x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Source
params.content: The source of the data needed to calculate the average

params.title: Period
params.content: The number of bars to be used to calculate the force index

params.title: MA Type
params.content: The type of moving average, Exponential; Simple;...

params.title: Deviation
params.content: The movement differential, is used to identify flat areas
